task.title: Starting and stopping Meeting servers
task.shortdesc: This section provides information on starting and stopping HCL Sametime Meeting servers.

taskbody.context:
This page will provide steps to stop and start the Sametime Meeting server on Docker and Kubernetes.
Procedure
Stop the Meeting server.
Docker:docker-compose down
Kubernetes: helm uninstall sametime-meetingsIn helm, the term uninstall is terminating the deployment. Additionally, the command assumes you are in the helm directory. The . represents current directory.
Start the Meeting server.
Docker: docker-compose up -d
Kubernetes: helm install sametime-meetings . In helm, the term install is a deployment of the applications. Additionally, the command assumes you are in the helm directory. The . represents current directory.
